net.corda.testing.dsl

Interface Verifies

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LedgerDSLInterpreter<T>, TransactionDSLInterpreter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LedgerDSL, TestLedgerDSLInterpreter, TestTransactionDSLInterpreter, TransactionDSL

    @DoNotImplement
public Verifies

    This interface asserts that the DSL at hand is capable of verifying its underlying construct(ledger/transaction).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Verifies

        public Verifies()

    • Method Detail

      • verifies

        @NotNull
EnforceVerifyOrFail verifies()

        Verifies the ledger/transaction, throws if the verification fails.

      • failsWith

        @NotNull
EnforceVerifyOrFail failsWith(@Nullable
                                       java.lang.String expectedMessage)

        Asserts that verifies() throws.

        Parameters:
        expectedMessage - An optional string to be searched for in the raised exception.

      • fails

        @NotNull
EnforceVerifyOrFail fails()

        Asserts that verifies throws, with no condition on the exception message.

        See Also:
        verifies

      • fails with

        @NotNull
EnforceVerifyOrFail fails with(@NotNull
                                        java.lang.String msg)
        See Also:
        failsWith
